Fix entry caps, direction-aware circuit breaker, BOS parity, plot equity support

- Increase max_open_trades from 2 to 3 \(futures and equity\)
- Plot: move trade summary from right panel to bottom table
- Plot: add equity \(SPY/QQQ\) support

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\vkudu\\claude-projects\\tradovate-futures-bot" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add ICT OTE strategy: 1ct sim, hybrid filters, per-symbol tuning

New Fibonacci OTE retracement strategy with impulse detection on 5m HTF,
62-79% zone calculation, and rejection entry on 3m LTF. Includes MMXM
enhancements \(premium/discount, dealing range, SMT divergence\).

Key tuning for profitability:
- 1-contract sim with R-target + breakeven trail \(replaces multi-contract\)
- Per-symbol config: ES=3ct/4R/3-of-5 hybrid, NQ=2ct/2R/2-of-5 hybrid
- Hybrid filter chain: DI, P/D, EMA 20/50, displacement, FVG confluence
- Configurable di_mandatory flag for hard-gate vs optional DI scoring
- Midday cutoff \(12-14\) + NQ PM cutoff \(no entries after 14:00\)
- Risk caps: ES=24 ticks, NQ=80 ticks

9-day backtest: ES +$2,304 \(60% WR, PF 2.76\), NQ +$1,587 \(67% WR, PF 3.05\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
